sentences.en: a story that blends fact and legend
sentences.cn: 事实与传说相糅合的一个故事

sentences.en: Blend a little milk with the custard powder to form a paste.
sentences.cn: 往蛋奶沙司粉里加入一点儿牛奶，搅成糊糊。

sentences.en: Blend a little milk with two tablespoons of treacle.
sentences.cn: 将少许牛奶和两大汤匙糖浆混合.

sentences.en: Blend in the lemon extract, lemon peel and walnuts.
sentences.cn: 调入柠檬汁、柠檬皮和核桃。

sentences.en: Blend the butter with the sugar and beat until light and creamy.
sentences.cn: 把糖掺入黄油然后搅拌至滑软细腻。

sentences.en: Blend the cornflour to a smooth paste with a little cold water.
sentences.cn: 加入少量的凉水，将玉米粉搅拌成均匀的糊状。

sentences.en: Blend the flour with the milk to make a smooth paste.
sentences.cn: 把面粉和牛奶调成均匀的面糊。

sentences.en: Blend the sugar, eggs, and flour.
sentences.cn: 把糖、鸡蛋和面粉掺在一起。

sentences.en: Do you think these two colours will blend together?
sentences.cn: 你认为这两种颜色和谐 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dust and blend blusher on the apples of your cheeks.
sentences.cn: 将胭脂调匀涂在你脸颊红润的地方。

sentences.en: His manner was a blend of friendliness and respect.
sentences.cn: 他的态度友善且毕恭毕敬.

sentences.en: It must have reinforced my determination to blend into my surroundings.
sentences.cn: 这势必让我更加下定决心融入周围环境。

sentences.en: It's a situation that calls for a blend of delicacy and force.
sentences.cn: 应付这种局面需要刚柔并济。

sentences.en: She felt she would blend in nicely.
sentences.cn: 她觉得自己可以很好地融入进来。

sentences.en: The causes are a complex blend of local and national tensions.
sentences.cn: 原因很复杂，既有地方性冲突也有全国范围的紧张局势。

sentences.en: Their voices blend marvellously as they sing in chorus.
sentences.cn: 他们合唱时嗓音非常和谐.

sentences.en: These houses seem to blend well with the trees and the situation.
sentences.cn: 这些房屋与树木和周围的环境十分协调.

words.tran_cn: [矿物] 闪锌矿；褐色闪光矿物

trans.tran_en: a mixture of different types of the same thing
to combine different things in a way that produces an effective or pleasant result, or to become combined in this way
to thoroughly mix together soft or liquid substances to form a single smooth substance
to thoroughly mix together soft or liquid substances to form a single smooth substance
